definition: large edible marine crustacean having a spiny carapace but lacking the large pincers of true lobsters, to make a retreat from an earlier commitment or activity
details:
noun
- large edible marine crustacean having a spiny carapace but lacking the large pincers of true lobsters
= synonyms: spiny lobster
- small freshwater decapod crustacean that resembles a lobster
= synonyms: crayfish, crawdad, crawdaddy
- tiny lobster-like crustaceans usually boiled briefly
= synonyms: crayfish, crawdad, ecrevisse
verb
- to make a retreat from an earlier commitment or activity
= example: to make a retreat from an earlier commitment or activity
= synonyms: retreat
